original_text: And desiring to know the charge for which they were accusing him, I brought him down to their council.
korean_text: 유대인들이 무슨 일로 그를 고발하는지 알고자 하여 그들의 공회로 데리고 내려갔더니

sentences.original_text: And desiring to know the charge for which they were accusing him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그에게 고발한 죄목을 알고자 하여

sentences.original_text: I brought him down to their council.
